thread.title: 2face Idibia: Singer cancels nationwide protest few hours to Feb 6
thread.title_full: 2face Idibia: Singer cancels nationwide protest few hours to Feb 6

author: Gbenga Bada
title: 2face Idibia: Singer cancels nationwide protest few hours to Feb 6
text:
Award winning pop star, Innocent Ujah Idibia aka 2face Idibia has cancelled his much anticipated protest. The singer cancelled the protest barely two hours to Sunday, February 6, 2017. Making the announcement via his Instagram handle, 2face cancelled the protest amidst tears giving security concerns as his reason. 
2face Idibia cancels nationwide protest (Instagram) He tearfully explained that to avoid bloodshed, he has decided to cancel the protest but stand by his convictions of the President Buhari led administration. ALSO READ: Music star to lead nationwide protest against Nigerian government The video was captioned:" Dear Nigerians!!! Due to security concerns and public safety consideration. I hereby announce the cancellation of the planned March. '' Earlier in the day, Afrobeat musician Femi Anikulapo-Kuti denied claims of him being against 2Face Idibiaâ€™s proposed nationwide protest.
